title: Actuary Scott Witt On Why, (Why Not) And How To Buy An Annuity
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Scott Witt is a fee-only insurance advisor who provides fiduciary advice to clients on products such as annuities and is paid on an hourly fee basis rather than through commissions. In this interview, Scott explains income annuities' potential benefits, provides a decision tree for making the selection and offers a glimpse into his own client engagements. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
